html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-12262017-10-05,  HC,  ECCC,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectRegulations Amending the Ozone-depleting Substances and Halocarbon Alternatives Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the OZONE-DEPLETING SUBSTANCES AND HALOCARBON ALTERNATIVES REGULATIONS in order to (1) control the amount of Hydrofluorocarbons (HFCs) available for use through the phase-down of bulk HFCs; (2) introduce controls on specific products containing HFCs, including air-conditioning and refrigeration equipment, foams and aerosols; and (3) make minor modifications to the hydrochlorofluorocarbons provisions in the Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2017-0216 Publication Date: 2017-10-18
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Ozone-depleting Substances and Halocarbon Alternatives Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the OZONE-DEPLETING SUBSTANCES AND HALOCARBON ALTERNATIVES REGULATIONS in order to (1) control the amount of Hydrofluorocarbons (HFCs) available for use through the phase-down of bulk HFCs; (2) introduce controls on specific products containing HFCs, including air-conditioning and refrigeration equipment, foams and aerosols; and (3) make minor modifications to the hydrochlorofluorocarbons provisions in the Regulations.
